name: trggrp

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, crg))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ TopRing, c0 ∈ Grp, c0 ∈ Ring)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cgrp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, crg))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c0, cgrp))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c0 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c0 ∈ Ring)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ring → c0 ∈ Grp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cgrp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, crg))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c0, cgrp))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c0 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c0 ∈ Ring)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ring → c0 ∈ Grp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, cgrp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c0, cgrp))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c0 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ring → c0 ∈ Grp)

comment: A topological ring is a group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
